channel.title: [pi]Sacred PK - construction nazi zombie new skills tab loads off pictures!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ewoRA.jpg[/img]
[size=10pt]Features[/size] Summoning, Dungeoneering, and all other skills working! Summoning familiars, pets Charms from monsters, and Summoning shop 3 fully completeable quests 27 fully completeable achievements Construction skill, building stuff Full GWD with Nex! Custom mini-games Dupe fixes Overloads New gameframe etc. Changed a lot interfaces to better ones Dungeoneering with NPCs, killcount, rewards shop! GWD and Dungeoneering NPCs Dungeoneering and new GWD items Pest Control with rewards shop Hunter with implings and looting Mage Bank with rewards shop JAD (Fire cape) Corporeal Beast Evil Spirit (Wildy boss) King Black Dragon Barrelchest guardian Gnome and Wildy agility course All RC altars All skillcape emotes working (Dung too!) Better bank, shop, trade etc. interfaces Working GS, SS, PvP, SoL and other weapon specs Pk, Mage Bank, Multi PvP, Fun PK Sprit Shields with effects! DFS special Full PvP, Primal, Promethium, Zephyrium, Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Dragon (g), Soulbell and more armors with correct stats Some great and awesome shops! Custom Donator zone with shops, skilling and monsters nazi zombies RFD minigame new bank interfaces new skills tab interface And even more that I can't remember[/center]
[b]witch skills tab do you like better number one or two note number 1 is the skill tab now please tell me witch one you like better[/b] [b]number 1[/b] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture036-1.png[/img] [b]number 2[/b] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture038.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture033.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture034.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture021.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture023.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture024.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture029.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture031.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TsS3G.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/256B4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2hLZL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cwuXr.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7Ix4a.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/p8lOa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wUuzy.png[/img]
[code]~ 1/23/12 - added loyalty titles were you right click on a player to see the title - liamp - added in game highscores- liamp ~~~1/24/12 - Decompiled Signlink.class in client. ~Max - Added runescape's newest context menu's - Max - Fixed Deposit Item's so it does NOT lag/freeze you - Max - Added Random Events Base working on finishing it. - Shane - Loyalty tags are now added into chatbox. - Max - Added Server Notice (A message appears as a yell everyone so often) - Max - Added when a staff member logs in it shows a message (for the lulz). - Shane ~~~~1/25/12 - Fixed skilling teleport and added new teleport (Advanced Skilling) - Max - AWESOME NEW UPDATE! 100% Regional clipping! - Max - Clipped firemaking! - Max - Re-Wrote Thieveing, and firemaking, crafting! - Max - Added double EXP weekends! - Max - Added restricted donator zone area! If isDonator = 0 you are teleported out of donar area and if isDonator = 1 you are aloud to stay:) - Max ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/26/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - More stability - Sacred - Fixed deadlocks - Sacred - Fixed the pathfinder compiler error thing - Sacred - Updated Forums/Website - Sacred
~~~1/26/12 - re-wrote the Custom RFD Quest - liamp - New mini-quest used for construction talk to xarzus at home (It has some bugs I'm fixing)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/27/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - Added portal for RFD quest - Sacred - Added money pouch (Download these files [http://uppit.com/es9o24isav2c/coinorb.rar] then extract it it to 'Sprites' folder in cache :) - Sacred - added half off zombiecaves finishing tomorrow - liamp
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/28/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - Fixed 2 compiler errors (cycleventhandler thing) by someone - Sacred - Added CycleEvent system - Sacred - Server is now stable, fixed the massive lagging - Sacred - Added MySQL.java for future Vote4Cash, Web Hiscores, Auto donation system & ETC - Fixed 1 Duel Arena dupe =) - Sacred - Added Face North - Sacred - new minigame finished zombiecaves kinda like nazi zombies - liamp - add the zombiecaves to minigames - liamp - moved godwars to boss teleport - liamp
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/29/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - Made 'Deposit all carried items' & 'Deposit worn items' for only donators' only feature =) - Sacred - [Perfectionist tweak] Prioritized menu clicking - Sacred - Server disconnection fixed - Sacred - Overload server disconnecting fixed - Sacred - Opening bank anywhere fixed (If someone attempted to, the server will announce like this'[Playername] has attemted to bank hack!') - Sacred - Stackable equipment dupe fixed - Sacred - Added Donator Points system - Sacred - Added Donator Shop (Feel free to add items via ShopAssistant.java) - Sacred - fix the 3072 error - liamp - added a cycle event for zombie game so the next waves should start - liamp ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/30/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ - Added Context Menu Image - Sacred - Added basic report abuse system - Sacred - New startup client =) - Sacred & - Joseph - 699 Special Attack Bar - Sacred - New Compass Sprite :) - Sacred - New bank interface - Sacred - Many many many new interfaces & sprites - Sacred - Added 'Deposit worn items' (Donators' only feature) - Fixed 'Deposit carried items lagg' (Donators' only feature) - made so in nazi zombie minigame you keep items on death - liamp[/code]
[b]programmers: liamp - me max shane
new person who programs the client: joseph and max does client too[/b]

item.title: [pi]Sacred PK - construction nazi zombie new skills tab loads off pictures!
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[center]

[size=10pt]Features[/size]
Summoning, Dungeoneering, and all other skills working!
Summoning familiars, pets
Charms from monsters, and Summoning shop
3 fully completeable quests
27 fully completeable achievements
Construction skill, building stuff
Full GWD with Nex!
Custom mini-games
Dupe fixes
Overloads
New gameframe etc.
Changed a lot interfaces to better ones
Dungeoneering with NPCs, killcount, rewards shop!
GWD and Dungeoneering NPCs
Dungeoneering and new GWD items
Pest Control with rewards shop
Hunter with implings and looting
Mage Bank with rewards shop
JAD (Fire cape)
Corporeal Beast
Evil Spirit (Wildy boss)
King Black Dragon
Barrelchest guardian
Gnome and Wildy agility course
All RC altars
All skillcape emotes working (Dung too!)
Better bank, shop, trade etc. interfaces
Working GS, SS, PvP, SoL and other weapon specs
Pk, Mage Bank, Multi PvP, Fun PK
Sprit Shields with effects! DFS special
Full PvP, Primal, Promethium, Zephyrium, Torva, Virtus, Pernix,
Dragon (g), Soulbell and more armors with correct stats
Some great and awesome shops!
Custom Donator zone with shops, skilling and monsters
nazi zombies
RFD minigame
new bank interfaces
new skills tab interface
And even more that I can’t remember[/center]

witch skills tab do you like better number one or two
note number 1 is the skill tab now please tell me witch one you like better
number 1

number 2

SSScreenCapture033.png767×504

SSScreenCapture034.png767×504

SSScreenCapture021.png767×504

[code]~ 1/23/12

  • added loyalty titles were you right click on a player to see the title - liamp
  • added in game highscores- liamp
- Decompiled Signlink.class in client. ~Max
- Added runescape's newest context menu's - Max
- Fixed Deposit Item's so it does NOT lag/freeze you - Max
- Added Random Events Base working on finishing it. - Shane
- Loyalty tags are now added into chatbox. - Max
- Added Server Notice (A message appears as a yell everyone so often) - Max
- Added when a staff member logs in it shows a message (for the lulz). - Shane
~~~~1/25/12
- Fixed skilling teleport and added new teleport (Advanced Skilling) - Max
- AWESOME NEW UPDATE! 100% Regional clipping! - Max
- Clipped firemaking! - Max
- Re-Wrote Thieveing, and firemaking, crafting! - Max
- Added double EXP weekends! - Max
- Added restricted donator zone area! If isDonator = 0 you are teleported out of donar area and if isDonator = 1 you are aloud to stay:) - Max
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/26/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- More stability - Sacred
- Fixed deadlocks - Sacred
- Fixed the pathfinder compiler error thing - Sacred
- Updated Forums/Website - Sacred

~~~1/26/12
- re-wrote the Custom RFD Quest - liamp
- New mini-quest used for construction talk to xarzus at home (It has some bugs I'm fixing)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/27/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Added portal for RFD quest - Sacred
- Added money pouch (Download these files [http://uppit.com/es9o24isav2c/coinorb.rar] then extract it
  it to 'Sprites' folder in cache :) - Sacred
- added half off zombiecaves finishing tomorrow - liamp


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/28/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Fixed 2 compiler errors (cycleventhandler thing) by someone - Sacred
- Added CycleEvent system - Sacred
- Server is now stable, fixed the massive lagging - Sacred
- Added MySQL.java for future Vote4Cash, Web Hiscores, Auto donation system & ETC
- Fixed 1 Duel Arena dupe =) - Sacred
- Added Face North - Sacred
- new minigame finished zombiecaves kinda like nazi zombies  - liamp
- add the zombiecaves to minigames - liamp
- moved godwars to boss teleport - liamp


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/29/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Made 'Deposit all carried items' & 'Deposit worn items' for only donators' only feature =) - Sacred
- [Perfectionist tweak] Prioritized menu clicking - Sacred
- Server disconnection fixed - Sacred
- Overload server disconnecting fixed - Sacred
- Opening bank anywhere fixed (If someone attempted to, the server will announce like this'[Playername] has attemted to bank hack!') - Sacred
- Stackable equipment dupe fixed - Sacred
- Added Donator Points system - Sacred
- Added Donator Shop (Feel free to add items via ShopAssistant.java) - Sacred
- fix the 3072 error - liamp
- added a cycle event for zombie game so the next waves should start - liamp
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~1/30/12~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Added Context Menu Image - Sacred
- Added basic report abuse system - Sacred
- New startup client =) - Sacred & - Joseph
- 699 Special Attack Bar - Sacred
- New Compass Sprite :) - Sacred
- New bank interface - Sacred
- Many many many new interfaces & sprites - Sacred
- Added 'Deposit worn items' (Donators' only feature)
- Fixed 'Deposit carried items lagg' (Donators' only feature)
- made so in nazi zombie minigame you keep items on death - liamp[/code]

[b]programmers:
liamp - me
max
shane


new person who programs the client: joseph 
and max does client too[/b]

Read full topic
